message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this price reflects its true value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets within your acceptable range.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $9,250?
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $9,100 for the product. This still allows me to stay within my budget while acknowledging the value of the item.
